title: Institutional Framework Shift
description: Detects when sudden institutional policy changes (like those at the NSF) alter the landscape of support and eligibility, influencing which research or narratives are prioritized or marginalized.
indicators: Institutional Funding Reallocation: Detection of abrupt funding pauses, cost caps, or structural changes that affect which scientific narratives receive support.
Eligibility Criteria Shift: Detection of changes in eligibility requirements, such as restricting grants to first-year PhD students only, excluding previously eligible groups.
